1.Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
2.If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
3.Peace begins with a smile.
4.Good works are links that form a chain of love.
5.In the home begins the disruption of the peace of the world.
6.Love until it hurts.
7.The best way to succeed in life is to act on the advice we give to others.
8.Life is a challenge, we must take it.
9.God gives us things to share, God doesn't give us things to hold
10.We can not do great things on this earth. We can only do small things with great love.
